docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: https://github.com/un1t/django-cleanup
docs.text:
pip install django-cleanup==5.2.0

pip install pillow

https://pypi.org/project/django-ckeditor/ pip install django-ckeditor

docs.title: Настройка dotenv
docs.text:
dotenv

pip install python-dotenv

from pathlib import Path
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
from django.contrib.messages import constants as messages

# Loading ENV
env_path = Path('.') / '.env'

#env_path = '.test.env'
load_dotenv(dotenv_path=env_path)

docs.title: https://django-braces.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
docs.text:
pip install django-braces

pip install mkdocs https://www.mkdocs.org/

pip install mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin

https://github.com/lukasgeiter/mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin

pip install mkdocs-material https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/getting-started/
